author: bdelacretaz
msg: added LICENSE and a BUILDING document that explains how to build and run Sling

author: jeremias
msg: Added support for DOMSource to Preloader SVG so a URI Resolver can be written that provides the SVG as a W3C SVG DOM.

author: mcculls
msg: Remove use of 'this.XYZ' in plugin code

author: solprovider
msg: Can edit XML Resources!  (Compare with other Lenya versions: No Areas and no temporary files.  Alas, no security beyond deleting the "edit" Module -- if one person can edit, everybody can.)
New code for handling Modules (configuration, variables, resources, inheritance) written but not activated.
The next task is activate new Module code, leading to Publication configuration and Add New Resource functions.
[This was the comment for last commit.  Sent wrong comment while fixing Subversion issues with these files.]
